prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Whitehead Family Papers, 1960-2006, Accession #6409-e, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Info
acqinfo.p: The papers were given to the Library by Ann Whitehead Thomas, on August 9, 2007.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Robert Whitehead was a member of the Virginia House of Delegates for Amherst and Nelson Counties.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains an M.A. thesis The Political Career of Robert Whitehead by William Baldwin Obrochta, 1985; correspondence concerning the thesis; an interview with Ann Whitehead Thomas, 2006, by James H. Hershman, Jr., chiefly concerning her father; remarks by George E. Allen at the unveiling of a portrait of Whitehead; a letter from Francis Pickens Miller on Whitehead, 1960; and assorted clippings.

did.unittitle: 2006 December 28 Interview with Ann Whitehead Thomas, daughter of Robert Whitehead [Includes personal memories of her father]
1961 June - 1963 March Letters and News Clippings relating to Memorials for Robert Whitehead
1985 May-September Thesis Paper, The Political Career of Robert Whitehead, by William B. Obrochta and letters containing corrections to it
